name: Tollund Men "Door" 7" SOLD OUT
description: Fourteen minutes of romantic outsider dirge-pop. Depressive post-punk that folds in on itself in washes of blown out first wave industrial (i.e. Minimal Man, Cabaret Voltaire, Suicide) influenced requiems to the damaged disposition of modern man. While drawing from the past Tollund Men remain contemporary in both style and approach, creating something firmly in the tradition of early industrial experimentation while remaining relevant today. "Let's die." Sample: "Fire" 300 copies Hand assembled seam-out "d-beat sleeves" on 80lb linen paper Bleak Environment -011

name: Nuit Noire - "Pleine Lune" SOLD OUT
description:
Self described faerical blasting punk. Skirting on the edges of black metal, Nuit Noire brings us four unreleased recordings of night-obsessed songs, both raw and charming. Recorded in 2010, Tenebras' more rudimentary and stripped down approach nicely bridges the old to the new. Xerox prints on linen paper. Comes with 1" pin.
P
200 copies on Chrome tapes
Bleak Environment -010

name: Material Sequence - "Residual Grid" C-45 SOLD OUT
description:
Dense industrial/techno. Material Sequence submerges into vast, aggressively atmospheric soundscapes. While unrelentingly mechanical in nature, live playing and avoidance of sequencer abuse leaves the recording undeniably human.

"Like Surgeon meeting Esplendor Geometrico in an alien time collapse"

100 copies
Bleak Environment -015

description:
Black Church "Heaven's temple fails to rise"

A slow wraith from the south. C-27 of spiraling bleakness. Extreme repetition of noisy plodding "black metal" dirges. Imagery and sound evoke extreme hopelessness and decay. 

100 copies

name: Tollund Men "Demo I" 1"pin  SOLD OUT
description: 100 exist

name: Heinz Hopf - Self Titled - 12"
description:
There are no words to say how amazing the Heinz Hopf's debut album is. They are a harsh noise duo consisting of Matthias Andersson and Dan Johansson. The first is the mind behind the label Release the bats, and the second is the man behind the moniker Sewer Election. The result is 32 minutes of pure, brutal and uncompromising harsh noise. Comparisons with Incapacitants is too easy, their love of the Japanese noise is too evident. Comparisons that do not lead to the cloning of a sound. Their sound is personal, powerful, brutal, but in the end is only joyous. The joy of playing together. The joy of composing together. The joy of creating together. In the end is what noise should be. Is what noise must be. In short, simply beautiful. 


lmt to 200 copies.
A Dear Girl Called Wendy 14

name: Street Drinkers ”Dead Secrets” 12”
description:
Street Drinkers ”Dead Secrets” 12”

Four tracks of cold and bitter post punk from this Swedish one-man endeavour.
With ”Dead Secrets” the project explores new territory and the drones
of the past releases have been replaced with arrow-like drum machines
and sharp riffs. The secrets are indeed dead and gone and what is left
is the naked body alone, making it possible for the audience to witness
every drop of blood and white body fluid pouring from the work.

Posh Isolation 075

name: Sissy Spacek - Anti-clockwise 7"  SOLD OUT
description:
From the same session of Dash LP, on side A 17 new short hyperactive bursts of the finest extreme noisecore . Lasse Marhaug joins the core duo of John Wiese and Corydon Ronnau. On side B live capture recorded in Baltimore, march 2010. 
lmt to 150.

Excellent Italian import

A Dear Girl Called Wendy #16

name: Alleypisser - Kvalt - 7"+c38 SOLD OUT
description:
Amplified metal, electronics and tapes from Denmark. Alleypisser takes inspirations from italian industrial gods like M.B. and Mauthausen Orchestra and his phenomenal use of tapes and metal ensures that Alleypisser is one of the best industrial act in Europe.. 
The result for Kvalt is a 7" and a c38 for something like 50 minutes of music.
All package in a reel to reel box with insert. 
lmt to 100.

A Dear Girl Called Wendy #17
Italian Import

Highly Recommended

name: ARKHE - It is the curse of dimensionality
description:
C20

First release from this swedish act. The creator behind the project is better known for his works in Pestdemon. Arkhe follows in the same footsteps with cold and desolate sounds. This minimal and dreary recording is a definately one of his strongest outputs so far.
100 copies.

Järtecknet 10

name: F. E. Denning - ”Rites of Passage” 2 x cs  SOLD OUT
description:
F. E. Denning - ”Rites of Passage” 2 x cs
 
”Rites of Passage” is a natural continuation of F.E. Dennings previous output, following an even more minimal, almost ambient like approach. However that does not make this recording any less powerful, what could even argue that the minimal quality of the recording only adds to the already impressive focus and vision of F.E. Dennings work. 
Double tape of clear and existential drones.
 
81 copies
Posh Isolation 084

name: Sump/Sexdrome split 7"  SOLD OUT
description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9TlUjGBamU

name: Iron Pillar - "Whipping Post" SOLD OUT
description: Whipping Post is the first release from this wicked and nasty Swedish act. With a naive and unpolished sound this one-man crusade delivers hateful power electronics. The recording is diveded into four seperated pieces, each owing its own character. Moving from minimal feedback and screamed vocals to a more layered, powerful sound. 100 copies Järtecknet

name: VULTURE HECK -Pat Keck SOLD OUT
description:
"this guy's stuff is sneaky." - Jason T. Miles


Sad, dark adventures from entrail master P. Keck.
"I just thought about crying and fucking you and telling you how much I love you."

name: Hvide Sejl - ”The Nude” SOLD OUT
description:
First Hvide Sejl release in years and something has happened. ”The Nude” presents two lengthy tracks of synth, tape manipulations and field recordings, ranging from heavy claustrophobic drones to light, almost soundtrack like qualities.

99 copies
Posh Isolation 079

name: Niding ”Plågor”  SOLD OUT
description:
Niding is a project hard to do justice in a few lines of explanation and when doing so there is the chance of confusing an audience more than enlighten it.
”Plågor” is the second release of the project after the debut last year on Järtecknet. In many ways this new release follows a similar path but still something is quite different. The recording portrays a face more bold and it becomes obvious that the introvert feeling of the first tape was and still is a conscious decision by the artist. Leaving the listener with an almost voyeuristic feeling, it is obvious that the universe wherein Niding works is a universe where there is room for only one and even though the listener is offered a glimpse, we may and can not enter.
As with many of the artist’s other works and projects the smell of his land follows the work.
Six dark, melancholic, musical pieces.
Essential!                      
 
150 copies
Posh isolation 085

name: Erotikens Historie II –”Jenna Talackova...  SOLD OUT
description:
Erotikens Historie II –”Jenna Talackova, Transgender beauty queen, disqualified from Miss Universe Canada.”

Erotikens Historie continues the documentation of human sexualis with hard oscillating drones and heavy synth. 
This time Erotikens Historie is Assault Guard, Hannes Norrvide & Hvide Sejl.
 
89 copies
Posh Isolation 081

name: FEBERDRÖM - Att födas i dy för att gå under i lågor - C40
description:
Industrial sounds with a psychedelic touch. Forging together rhytmical percussion loops, concrete sounds and droning synths into longer industrial compositions with a rough analouge feeling to it. 
100 copies.

name: Dragstrip -Nina Hartmann

name: Polyurethane "live" SOLD OUT
description:
Ran across a few of these.

Crushing, blown out industrial hate punk. Sterile, null, mass produced. Not a "live tape" in the traditional sense of a chance soundboard recording of a live band, but a planned, documented performance and evolution of this once bedroom recording project. Print on 80lb linen paper.

Bleak Environment 008 
------

Edition of 100

name: UTMARKEN 2011 3xTAPE COMPILATION BOX SOLD OUT
description: Final Utmarken statement. Long time in the making, this 3xC20 boxset follows up the Utmarken compilation 10" from 2009. 10 minutes each from Ättestupa, Arv & Miljö, Lust For Youth, Blodvite, Skuggor and Sewer Election. Housed in a big box, including a 24-page booklet. 200 copies. Utmarken 44

description:

name: Recombinants "hideous seed" SOLD OUT
description:
c26 Edt. of 60
Material on Hideous Seed originating with
Jacob DeRaadt (Sterile Garden/Basement Tapes)
supplying reel to reel source tapes of record loops to
Luis Gonzales (Lavas Magmas/Crooked Columns)
for heavy analogue processing and arrangement.
Result is fantastic modern electronic music with
archaic tendencies. Embracing industrial tape
culture with resolutely forward thinking processing.

name: V/A ”Port Out, Starboard Home” 2 x c40 SOLD OUT
description:
Hvide Sejl
Olymphia
Amphetamine Logic
Damien Dubrovnik
Assault Guard
Erotikens Historie ft. Blodvite
Croatian Amor
Iron Pillar
Alleypisser
Forza Albino
Puce Mary
War
Snatcher
Body League
Caucasian Colony ft. Amphetamine Logic
LR

80 minutes portraying many different industrial faces, all focusing on
the struggles of human trafficking to Scandinavia.
“Port Out, Starboard Home” is by far the strongest and most focused
work that has been compiled by various artists in the history of Posh Isolation releases.
An essential release for anyone with interest in the blossoming industrial scene of southern Scandinavia.
Dedicated to all the girls and boys who got lost.

”Love Knows No Borders”

Posh Isolation 080

name: V/A "The Maritime Trade" SOLD OUT
description:
.Damien Dubrovnik
.Amphetamine Logic
.LR
.Croatian Amor

Originally released as a 2 x cs ltd. to 22.
New Danish Industrial. 

"The sound of the container ships mixed with the birch trees and the colors of the containers, red, green, blue and yellow, made it a place unlike most. Time would stand still for a few hours in the afternoon, only to continue where it had left off. Sometimes things change for the better, sometimes things change forever.."

Posh Isolation 063

name: Arv & Miljö "Oppna Vattendrag" SOLD OUT
description:
Oppna Vattendrag is the Counterpart to Arv & Miljös recent release on Järtecknet. A move away from the urban environment, and a reach out towards nature and a different Sweden.
Arv & Miljö is a blurred sound and a very clear vision. The noise is buried and never blows up and finds its value in an never ending waiting, thus creating a tough and different listen. 

"He had examined the plants of the garden, smelled them, pulled them up by the roots, felt the soil. Only to place them back again, like nothing had ever happened."

76 copies
Posh Isolation 064
